entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Trois-Pistoles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
